points.description: Observation: Leaf packs break down quickly with softening and visible fungal growth. Kick sample includes several shredder taxa Criteria: Fast breakdown with strong biological processing and multiple shredder groups present
Observation: Moderate softening of leaves with some fungal growth. One or two shredder groups present at low abundance Criteria: Intermediate breakdown with partial shredder presence
Observation: Little change to leaf material after several weeks. Packs often coated in silt. Assemblage mostly tolerant collectors and grazers Criteria: Slow breakdown with few or no active shredders
Observation: No noticeable mass loss. Strong odor or anoxic conditions. No shredders in a reach where they are expected Criteria: Very slow breakdown and absence of shredder taxa in suitable habitat
